description: You can add vehicles to your selected partner discount one at a time.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can add vehicles to your selected partner discount one at a time."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

Once a vehicle is added it will be eligible for the 100% discount from the Congestion Charge immediately. It may take up to 24 hours for its status to update from 'CC - should be paid' to CC - 100% discount' in your account..
If your vehicle doesn't meet, or isn't exempt from, the ULEZ emissions standards, you need to upload it to your Auto Pay service to avoid getting a penalty.
You can add a batch of up to 15 vehicles one at a time. Or, to make multiple vehicle changes, upload a vehicle list file .
We do not hold details for this vehicle

Registered outside the United Kingdom: We are unable to display the make, model and colour information. Confirm your details before continuing.
The vehicle selected is already active on a selected partner discount.
If the number plate is correct but the description shown is wrong, you can still add this vehicle to the discount.
Vehicle information is provided to TfL by the DVLA, so you'll need to let the DVLA know if your details are wrong or need to be updated.
